en.feesAppliedDetailsTitle: Have you already applied for help with your application fee?
en.hwfReferenceNumberLabel: Enter your help with fees reference number
en.hwfReferenceNumberBody: You received this number when you applied for help with fees.
en.noHwfLabel: You need to apply for help with fee (opens in a new tab) before you continue with this application.

feesAppliedDetails.required: Select yes if you already applied for help with your application fee

helpWithFeesReferenceNumber.required: Enter the help with fees reference number you received when you applied for help with fees
helpWithFeesReferenceNumber.invalid: The help with fees reference number is not valid

cy.feesAppliedDetailsTitle: A ydych chi eisoes wedi gwneud cais am help i dalu ffi’r cais?
cy.hwfReferenceNumberLabel: Rhowch eich cyfeirnod help i dalu ffioedd
cy.hwfReferenceNumberBody: Cawsoch y rhif hwn pan wnaethoch gais am help i dalu ffioedd.
cy.noHwfLabel: Mae arnoch angen gwneud cais am help i dalu ffioedd (yn agor mewn tab newydd) cyn i chi barhau gyda’r cais hwn.

feesAppliedDetails.required: Dewiswch do os ydych eisoes wedi gwneud cais am help i dalu ffi eich cais

helpWithFeesReferenceNumber.required: Nodwch y cyfeirnod Help i dalu Ffioedd a gawsoch pan wnaethoch chi wneud cais am Help i dalu Ffioedd
helpWithFeesReferenceNumber.invalid: Nid yw’r cyfeirnod Help i Dalu Ffioedd yn ddilys
